text: Denuvo Anti-Tamper is an anti-tamper technology Anti-tamper software is software which makes it harder for an attacker to modify it. and digital rights management software. It was developed by Austrian software company called Denuvo Software Solutions GmbH. Denuvo Software Solutions GmbH is a subsidary of Irdeto. The common name of Denuvo Anti-Tamper is Denuvo. ==References== == Other websites == * * List of Denuvo-protected games and their cracked status at CrackWatch Category:Software Category:2014 establishments in Europe
title: Denuvo
